Was looking for a Chipmunk t-shirt for granddaughter and was very pleased with the quality.  Arrived very quickly.  This shirt we ordered a 5T and 6T as she is growing into the 5T, so we thought it would be large enough for her for at least a year, but it runs small. She does have a longer torso but overall it runs small. Ordered 6T and still not much bigger.  Won't get much wear out of this shirt and it is soooooo cute and well made that I am sad.

This shirt is bright and so beautiful. It is the perfect thickness (not too thin but soft and comfortable). We live in FL so I am glad the shirt is not overwhelmingly hot, but just right for cooler days. Since it is soft, I am sure it is perfect to wear with other layers for colder days.
